mapper.select: SELECT class_category_id, business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active FROM MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY ORDER BY class_type, class_category_id
SELECT class_category_id, business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active FROM MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY WHERE class_type = #{categoryType} ORDER BY class_category_id

SELECT class_category_id, business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active FROM MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY WHERE business_account_id = #{businessAccountId} ORDER BY class_type, class_category_id

SELECT class_category_id, business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active FROM MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY WHERE business_account_id IS NULL ORDER BY class_type, class_category_id

SELECT class_category_id, business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active FROM MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY WHERE class_type = #{categoryType} AND business_account_id IS NULL ORDER BY class_category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_CLASSCATEGORY (business_account_id, class_type, class_category_name, description, is_active) VALUES (#{businessAccountId}, #{categoryType}, #{categoryName}, #{description}, #{isActive})
